verbose_text: [XREF_BIBR] The anti-hyperglycemic activity of T. grandis bark extract may be due to the regeneration of islets ' beta-cells following destruction by alloxan, as the extract shows significant reduction of blood glucose levels in 15 and 30 days, at a dosage of 2.5 and 5 g/kg body wt., an effect similar to that of glibenclamide.
